mapper.select: select bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bDate, bHit, bGroup, bStep, bIndent from mvc_board order by bGroup desc, bStep asc
mapper.update: update mvc_board set bStep = bStep + 1 where bGroup = #{bgroup} and bStep > #{bstep}
mapper.insert: insert into mvc_board(bId,bName,bTitle,bContent, bHit, bGroup, bStep,bIndent) values (mvc_board_seq.nextval, #{bname}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, 0,#{bgroup},#{bstep}+1,#{bindent}+1)
